name: The Shame of Delsere
flavorText: Unable to make this belt work with his Magnum Opus, Delsere rejected it out of hand and forbade anyone from using it. Ever.
flavorTextHtml: Unable to make this belt work with his Magnum Opus, Delsere rejected it out of hand and forbade anyone from using it. Ever.

secondary.textHtml: Your Signature Spells attack 50% faster and restore 9 Arcane Power. (Wizard Only) [9 - 12]
secondary.text: Your Signature Spells attack 50% faster and restore 9 Arcane Power. (Wizard Only) [9 - 12]
